page.title: 01EAST ALLINGTON RESUME
page.content: Ours is a predominantly rural area with more cows,sheep and pigs than people. It comprises about 24 farms,(some with additional accommodation for farm workers or holiday-makers)and includes the small village of East Allington.About 81 houses make up the the village. 50 are owned 20 are Council Houses,10 are rented and 2 are holiday lets. The total population of the area is around 243 (203 in the village and 40 on the farms). Besides the farms and houses are 2 shops(one includes a post office and petrol station-although petrol is often not available-)a pub, a church, a chapel, a primary school a school for boys with behavior problems and a small village hall which is the hub of the community.
